message: Fair 60-40 split. Accept and we both win big!
Let's flip the script. I propose a 60-40 split in my favor.  It's your turn to decide. Remember, the money will be worth less with each round.
Meet in the middle? 58-42 split. Time is money, let's settle!

I'm willing to be more flexible, but I still need a larger share. Let's try a 65-35 split. The clock is ticking, and the money is losing value. It's in both of our interests to come to an agreement soon.
Getting desperate? 56-44 split. Last reasonable offer before I lowball

Time is running out, and the value of the money is plummeting. This is my final offer: 70-30 in my favor.  Think carefully, Alice.  We both have a lot to lose if we reach the end without an agreement.
